elmurl was a caravan guard in the Sword Coast during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Belmurl was one of Orthil Voldovans guards during the voyage from Scornubel to Waterdeep late in the . He was badly injured, perhaps mortally during the first ambush that struck the caravan after leaving Scornubel. Orthil was informed of this just after learning that Horlo had perished.
